body:
Hi all!


I've successfully compiled Radiance using Cygwin on
Windows XP.


Here is a link to the web page from where you
can download the cygwin Radiance executables:


http://www.dream.unipa.it/dream/pub/dot/anselmo/radiance/03.php#binaries


There is also a short description about what to change in
the makeall script and Rmakefiles to have everything compiled,
and some snapshots of my window$/cygwin/radiance desktop.


Please notice that the binaries only work in the cygwin environment,
so it is necessary to install cygwin and Xfree86/Cygwin from:


http://www.cygwin.com


>From now on, window$ users have 
no excuses for not using the last CVS version
of Radiance! ;-)


Hope it may be useful! 
Enjoy!




ing. Francesco Anselmo
anselmo@dream.unipa.it


[ DREAm ] 
Dipartimento di Ricerche 
Energetiche e Ambientali


Università di Palermo


Viale delle Scienze
90128 Palermo - Italy


Tel + 39 091 236 302
Fax + 39 091 484 425
